text: Overall this is a great interchange with many connections to different regions in Singapore. Such as service 67 which goes to Choa Chu Kang and passes through Little India or services 4, 19, 20, 29 and 37 all offering direct access to those working in the Changi Industrial area another example being 969 for the fastest connection with the northern region. Housing a total of 24 services, it brings an ease to travelling for residents living here. The only issue is it being rather jammed along this area during peak hours.

A great big thank you to the staff working today (22 April 2025) üôèüèªüôèüèªüôèüèª my husband left his watch on a bus that was ending its route here so i called to ask if they could check for his watch & the staff working today was so helpful! a big thanks to the bus captain too (bus 65). they found the watch! we really appreciate it lots, thank you so much.

- near many malls and amenities
- quite crowded bus interchange even at night
- Tampines Int is part of the sheltered connection between EWL and DTL of Tampines Station (DTL side)
- many cool buses there, Linkker LM312 Electric and Enviro500 3 Door.
- 2 kinds of berth present
- Operated by SBST

Love this bus interchange. Direct bus 969 from Woodlands express to Tampines. At least 6 major shopping centres next to Tampines MRT station EW line and DT line  with plenty of dinning supermarket shopping banking library postage community centre cinemas entertainment and amenities nearby. Tidy clean relaxing setting to enjoy hawker delights with Western delights Japanese Korean Thai and Vietnam delights. Freshly prepared healthy ingridients with tender loving caring skillful cooking and professional warm services. Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students tourists expats locals visitors and families..

Bloody bus service 28 always notoriously late. Many times commuters have to wait at least 25 mins for the next bus service 28 to arrive. This is unacceptable. So what is SBS and LTA gonna do about it? I'm sure I'm not the only one that is complaining about this bus service 28 and other bus services too. And there's also a SBS driver of African origin whom I believe to be a PR. Lack of empathy by him and he would always stopped his bus few metres ahead of the bus stop because this sadistic driver wants his passengers to walk to his bus even though there were no other buses at the bus stops. I hope LTA would do regular audits on these type of drivers and the late bus service like this service 28.
